text: Lloyd's of London is a 1936 American drama movie directed by Henry King and starring Tyrone Power, Freddie Bartholomew, C. Aubrey Smith, Madeleine Carroll, Guy Standing. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1937. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: Lloyd's of London (movie)
